mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pgrboard (seq, title, ctnt, userPk) SELECT IFNULL(MAX(seq), 0) + 1, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{userPk} FROM pgrboard
mapper.select: SELECT A.boardPk, A.seq, A.title, A.hits, A.regDt, A.userPk, B.nickname AS writerNm FROM pgrboard A INNER JOIN pgruser B ON A.userPk = B.userPk ORDER BY A.boardPk DESC;
SELECT A.boardPk, A.seq, A.title, A.ctnt, A.hits, A.userPk, A.regDt, B.nickname AS writerNm FROM pgrboard A INNER JOIN pgruser B ON A.userPk = B.userPk WHERE A.boardPk = #{boardPk}
